name: Remember your Actions
description:
Remember you actions

Ludum Dare 47 Entry. Theme: You are stuck in a loop.

You like memory games?? You like them platforms??
You've come to the right place! Come... Come... :smile: 

In this game you have to perform simple platformer actions and then repeat them, again, and again, and again.. :smile: 
The game becomes progressively harder, increasing your sequence and level complexity. There are 8 levels in total.

Controls:
A/D or Arrows to Move;
Space to Jump;
Stay still to View the whole level
